english_example_sentence: My friend, may you seem healthy and energetic every new day.
russian_example_sentence: Мой друг, пусть ты выглядишь здоровым и энергичным каждый новый день.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşım, her yeni günde sağlıklı ve enerjik görünesin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Arkadaşım, her yeni günde sağlıklı ve enerjik ______.
